Project.Brief history of your project and organi: We are a well-known AI company for healthcare. Our goal is to empower individuals to proactively monitor their health and detect potential problems early - no matter where they are or what their economic situation is. We are committed to changing the way people participate in traditional health screenings, ultimately improving health and reducing the resource burden on hospitals. We need a lot of medical-related data in our research, and because the storage cost is relatively expensive, we choose IPFS, hoping to use miners to store some of the data we need.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Ten tasks from the Medical Segmentation Decathlon Challenge. Tasks are organized by organ system and pathology, as follow, Liver Tumours; Brain Tumours; Hippocampus; Lung Tumours; Prostate; Cardiac; Pancreas Tumour; Colon Cancer; Hepatic Vasculature; Spleen. Tasks are provided in both tar.gz and uncompressed format.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
1. We are currently downloading the source dataset on AWS
2. Encapsulate data into a car file through boost
3. Communicate with SP to determine whether to send data offline or online
4.Send deals to SPs
5.SPs store data
6. Keep data retrieval available
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America
